user.title: NSW Live Traffic Setup
user.description: Enter your Transport for NSW (TfNSW) Open Data API Key. You can obtain one from the TfNSW Open Data Hub.

error.cannot_connect: Failed to connect to the TfNSW API. Please check your network connection and the API status.
error.invalid_auth: Invalid TfNSW API Key. Please check your API key and try again.
error.unknown: An unknown error occurred. Please check the logs for more details.

abort.already_configured: NSW Live Traffic is already configured. You can only have one instance.

init.title: NSW Live Traffic Options
init.description: Configure options for the NSW Live Traffic integration. These settings determine which hazards are monitored and how proximity alerts are handled.

error.invalid_radius: Radius must be a non-negative number.
error.invalid_scan_interval: Scan interval must be at least 1 minute.
